faqs.question: What is the battery life of the iPhone 15?
faqs.answer: The iPhone 15 offers up to 20 hours of video playback.

faqs.question: How much does the MacBook Air weigh?
faqs.answer: The MacBook Air weighs just 2.7 pounds.

faqs.question: What ports does the MacBook Air have?
faqs.answer: The MacBook Air comes with two Thunderbolt / USB 4 ports.

faqs.question: Is the Apple Watch Series 9 waterproof?
faqs.answer: The Apple Watch Series 9 is water-resistant up to 50 meters.

faqs.question: Does the Apple Watch Series 9 have GPS?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Apple Watch Series 9 has built-in GPS.

faqs.question: What is the screen size of the iPad Pro?
faqs.answer: The iPad Pro is available in 11-inch and 12.9-inch sizes.

faqs.question: Does the iPad Pro support the Apple Pencil?
faqs.answer: Yes, the iPad Pro supports the Apple Pencil (2nd generation).

faqs.question: Do the AirPods Max have noise cancellation?
faqs.answer: Yes, the AirPods Max feature active noise cancellation.

faqs.question: What is the battery life of the AirPods Max?
faqs.answer: The AirPods Max offer up to 20 hours of listening time.

faqs.question: What chip does the Mac Mini use?
faqs.answer: The Mac Mini is powered by the Apple M2 chip.

faqs.question: Can the Mac Mini connect to multiple displays?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Mac Mini can connect to multiple displays.
